text.sentence: As of February 20th, my work schedule is changing again.
I'll be working from 8a.m. to 4:30p.m. at NCS, and from 6p.m. to 10p.m. at ACT.?
If you want to get a hold of me during the week, the best time to call is between 5p.m. and 5:30p.m. or between 10:30p.m. and 11:00p.m. ??

I don't promise that I can talk for very long at these times (especially not at the 5:00 interval), but if you have a quick question for me, or some information to pass along, those are the times you can do it.?
If you want to have a more substantial conversation, you can reach me on the weekend.?
After putting in a 60 hour week, I tend to sleep a little late on Saturday.?
I suggest calling after 11a.m. if you want a cheerful, alert response.?
And of course,? you can always reach me by email.?
